entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @IngrahamAngle You can have your right to worship. It doesn't change the fact that the Coronavirus is in our country, all over. If it can't be kept out of the WH, good luck with your church. Hopefully the big man in the sky helps you.
